message: Let's split fairly, Bob.  A slight advantage for me in the first round seems reasonable, don't you think?
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you a very fair 45% before inflation further erodes your share.  Don't be greedy.
Bob, my friend, I understand you want a good deal, but time is literally money for me in this game. I'm willing to be generous, but this is my final offer before the stakes shrink further.
